slogan.title: Optimize your restaurant with intelligence and freshness
slogan.desc: KeepItFresh is an intelligent solution that optimizes inventory management, temperature control, and customer service in restaurants.

about.title: Our Essence
about.desc: We are an intelligent solution that optimizes restaurant inventory management. It also allows real-time tracking of products, preventing food loss. An optimal solution that facilitates customer service by providing an easy and interactive tool.
